p: In this current work, we have carried out a hierarchical cluster analysis of 188 S. officinalis leaf essential oil compositions; the three chemical compositions presented above in conjunction with 185 analyses from the literature. A total of 26 components were used in the analysis. Based on the cluster analysis of the volatile compositions, there are five major chemotypes of Salvia officinalis: C1â€“C5 (see Figure 1).
